subtitle: sitting here and now in the body
physically and in spirit sitting here being
noticing the silence
focusing and concentrating on the silence
this is what our meditation will be today
deepening our connection to the silence
which is really a deeper connection to our self our real self
we can't hear the voice of silence and the voice of intuition
as long as there is mental chatter so just be here in the body in the heart
being aware of the silence and aware of our awareness itself
not waiting for me to say the next thing
but just being here with yourself
not wanting to get into a particular state
this is not about expecting
certain sensations to arise not about expecting
a blissful state to arise
not thinking about what kind of state we can achieve
but just going beyond all expectations
if there's something in you
that wants to achieve
something in meditation simply be aware of it
encompass it in the field of your awareness in a detached way
ego is just like little children running around or animals running around us
that's okay just let it be
we are pure awareness
not ego
there is a deep peace and stillness in awareness
if only we would identify at least with awareness and not the noise
you may become aware of new sensations in the body or new thoughts that's okay
just let it rest as you become aware
let it dissolve as it enters into the light of your awareness
this is not a superpower or anything it's very natural
very simple
no technique no thinking is required
totally accepting whatever state is here and now
and holding this space of awareness together
in
intense wakefulness
not sleep
if there is sleep or sleepiness that is fine
but don't be dragged along by bias
take life by the reins
sleep is unconsciousness
no good for meditation
don't identify with sleep
by the temptation of its comfort
but just be here
in vibrant awareness
boredom is ego don't identify with it confusion is also ego
restlessness is the ego
don't identify with these things
they are not bad things
they are just something that we don't want to be controlled by
and we do that through this awareness
the more we are rooted in awareness
stillness and peace the more that the ego does not control us that we have a grip of our life
you can even notice
boredom restlessness confusion doubt it doesn't feel good in the body
there's a negative charge to it
but peace
stillness
has
vibrancy
it feels good for the body
so let the body heal in this energy
there may be a aliveness in the legs in the stomach in the heart in the brain
let the body be in this space with you
be aware of everything without trying
aware of the sounds you hear the clothes on your skin the sensations in the body
what you see behind your eyelids
let awareness be natural
the only thing that is real
is consciousness
the experience of consciousness in this moment is the only thing that's real
the thoughts emotions
confusions and doubts and theories it's all the play of maya play of ego play of illusion
and it's easy to get caught up in it if we're not rooted in the experience of consciousness
so let it be
we stay in consciousness
not thinking about how to stay in it but just staying
thinking arises that's fine we can watch it but we don't have to be possessed by it
stay in consciousness the well-being and the peace
and the clarity of it
give it more honor than the word consciousness
you may call it your being
your god
atman
your inner buddha
whatever name you could give it
the importance is in the honoring of
what you recognize is a superior level of being in your life
so be it
you
